definition: a woman who is the custodian of children, to try to cure by special care of treatment, of an illness or injury
details:
noun
- a woman who is the custodian of children
= synonyms: nanny
- one skilled in caring for young children or the sick (usually under the supervision of a physician)
verb
- to try to cure by special care of treatment, of an illness or injury
= example: to try to cure by special care of treatment, of an illness or injury
- give suck to
= example: give suck to
= synonyms: suck
- maintain (a theory, thoughts, or feelings)
= synonyms: hold
- treat carefully
= example: treat carefully
- serve as a nurse
